text.section: The Commissioner shall approve or deny each application for a license within 60 days after the date when the application is made and the fees are paid.
The Commissioner shall issue a license to any applicant who meets the requirements of this subtitle.

section.section:
If the Commissioner denies an application, the Commissioner shall:
Notify the applicant of the denial;
Refund the license fee to the applicant; and
Keep the investigation fee and any charges collected under § 11-406 of this subtitle.

Within 20 days after the Commissioner denies an application, the Commissioner shall:
File in the Commissioner's office a written decision and statement of the reasons for denying the application; and
Send a copy of the decision and statement to the applicant.
